Publish Subscribe Test
Note
publishâ€“subscribe is a messaging pattern where senders of messages, called publishers, send messages directly to specific receivers, called subscribers.

To subscribe to a message use:
.pubsub('subscribe', 'connectionState', function(topic, data){
});

connectionState is the message, and data is the data recieved.

JOBQUEUE
Subscribed to 'jobQueueUpdate' message. Any updates will be shown here.
JobID:
{{jobQueue.jobId}}
JobStatus:
{{jobQueue.status}}

CONNECTION STATE
Subscribed to 'connectionState' message. Any updates will be shown here.
Status:
{{connState.status}}
Connected:
{{connState.connected}}
SYNC STATE
Subscribed to 'syncState' message. Any updates will be shown here.
Service:
{{syncState.service}}
Status:
{{syncState.status}}
